QuestData.Title: A Very Precious Cargo
QuestData.Description: We weren't the only ship in our convoy to get caught up in this mess. Our flagship ran aground to the east. It was holding a very precious cargo and I need you to bring it back here.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find the "Precious" cargo in Fogcliff Strand.
QuestData.RewardText: Who are you? Where's my dad? I'm hungry. Can I have a sword? Where's my dad?!
